text:
Monetta Eloyse Darnall (also Linda Darnell; October 16, 1923 – April 10, 1965) was an American actress. She was a model as a child. She played Amber in the movie "Forever Amber". She also played Daphne in "Unfaithfully Yours".
Darnell was born in Dallas, Texas. She died from fire-related burns in Glenview, Illinois.
